pages.text: Tridents can be a rather useful tool for a vampire, due to a certain trident-specific enchantment

Blood Transfer allows a trident to latch on to an entity and drain its blood, at the cost of a damage decrease.$(br)Blood drained by the trident will either go directly into your blood bar, or into a blood-storing item in your hand. Blood Transfer cannot completely drain something's blood, the amount it can drain depends on the level.
